data.md:MetaData: (Appendix) Stable carbon and oxygen isotope ratios of fine-fraction sediments across the Cretaceous/Tertiary boundary of DSDP Hole 74-529 from Walvis Ridge, South Atlantic
42 cores, 398 m cored, 19 m drilled, 77.7 % recovery
Nannofossil diversity and equitability and fine-fraction d13C across the Cretaceous/Tertiary boundary at Walvis Ridge Leg 74, South Atlantic
